trans-unit.target: 如果你的牌库顶牌是生物牌，你可以施放之。

trans-unit.source: Watchful Naga
trans-unit.target: 警醒那伽

trans-unit.source: You may exert Watchful Naga as it attacks. When you do, draw a card. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以于警醒那伽攻击时耗竭之。当你如此作时，抓一张牌。（已耗竭的生物于你的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。）

trans-unit.source: The forked tongue of the naga is sensitive to drifting scent trails from the past, present, and sometimes even the future.
trans-unit.target: 那伽的叉状蛇信对飘散在空中的气味尤其敏感，能够分辨出它是来自过去、现在甚或未来。

trans-unit.target: 阿恩祀群斗士

trans-unit.source: "The Second Sun nears its destination! Let it light the way to ours!"
trans-unit.target: 「神日即将就位！愿其指引我们明路！」
